sourcesContent:
const initialState = {
  good: 0,
  ok: 0,
  bad: 0
}

const counterReducer = (state = initialState, action) => {
  console.log(action)
  console.log(state)
  switch (action.type) {
    case 'GOOD':
      const plusGood=state.good+1
      const newGood={...state,good:plusGood}
      state=newGood
      return state
    case 'OK':
      return state +1
    case 'BAD':
      return state +1
    case 'ZERO':
      return state 
    default: return state
  }
  
}

export default counterReducer
